summary: The diff implements all 5 core requirements: CSV export (REQ-1), Razorpay payment automation (REQ-2), Razorpay configuration panel (REQ-3), notification system (REQ-4), and bulk actions (REQ-5). However, some acceptance criteria are partially implemented or missing evidence in the provided diff truncations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend webhook endpoint receives Razorpay payment confirmations
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo file is truncated before showing webhook endpoint implementation. While PaymentLink types exist, no HTTP outcall handler or webhook route verification is visible.

missing_requirements.requirement: Lead status automatically updates to 'paid' when payment succeeds
missing_requirements.reason: No automated status update logic visible in truncated backend code. The PaymentLink type exists but webhook processing logic is not shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Payment amount and transaction ID are recorded with the lead
missing_requirements.reason: PaymentLink structure includes amount but no transactionId field visible. Lead type does not show payment metadata fields in the truncated code.

missing_requirements.requirement: Test connection button validates Razorpay credentials
missing_requirements.reason: RazorpayConfigPanel.tsx is truncated before showing test connection button implementation. Form exists but validation button logic is missing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Notifications link to the relevant lead detail page
missing_requirements.reason: TopNav and NotificationsPage navigate to /leads list page, not individual lead detail pages. No lead/:id route navigation is shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Confirmation dialog shown before destructive operations
missing_requirements.reason: BulkActionsToolbar calls onDelete directly without confirmation. BulkStatusChangeDialog exists for status changes but no delete confirmation dialog is visible.
